subject: Football
Colleges and Universities
Demonstrations and Riots
lead_paragraph: Tony Pike threw for 250 yards and two touchdown passes and No. 22 Cincinnati remained in the hunt for the Big East title with a 28-20 victory against reeling Louisville on Friday night.
snippet: Tony Pike threw for 250 yards and two touchdown passes and No. 22 Cincinnati remained in the hunt for the Big East title with a 28-20 victory against reeling Louisville on Friday night.
